attacks.name: Fury Attack
attacks.term_text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 10 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.term_text: This attack does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Sniping Arrow
attacks.term_text: This attack does 70 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Big Beat
attacks.term_text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t use Big Beat.

attacks.name: Jump Blues
attacks.term_text: This attack also does 20 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Beat Punk
attacks.term_text: This Pokémon also does 70 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Crunch
attacks.term_text: Flip a coin. If heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

ability.name: Intimidating Fang
ability.description: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent’s Active Pokémon do −20 damage.

attacks.name: Plasma Hurricane
attacks.term_text: Take a  Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Electronica
attacks.term_text: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Confused.

ability.name: Thunderclap Flash
ability.description: At the end of your first turn, take a  Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokémon.

ability.name: Illuminate
ability.description: Once during your turn, you may put a random Pokémon from your deck into your hand.

attacks.name: Trip Over
attacks.term_text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

ability.name: Heal Block
ability.description: Pokémon (both yours and your opponent’s) can’t be healed.

attacks.name: Lycanfang
attacks.term_text: Discard a  Energy from this Pokémon.

attacks.name: Let’s Throw
attacks.term_text: If Passimian is on your Bench, this attack does 40 more damage.

attacks.name: Sand Tomb
attacks.term_text: During your opponent’s next turn, the Defending Pokémon can’t retreat.

attacks.name: Meddle
attacks.term_text: Discard a random Pokémon Tool card from your opponent’s hand.

attacks.name: Fake Out
attacks.term_text: Flip a coin. If heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Paralyzed.

attacks.name: Poaching Fangs
attacks.term_text: Flip 3 coins. For each heads, a card is chosen at random from your opponent’s hand. Your opponent reveals that card and shuffles it into their deck.

attacks.name: New Wave
attacks.term_text: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

ability.name: More Poison
ability.description: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon takes +10 damage from being Poisoned.

attacks.name: Grindcore
attacks.term_text: Flip a coin until you get tails. For each heads, discard a random Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon.

attacks.name: 2-Step
attacks.term_text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 20 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Electro House
attacks.term_text: Your opponent’s Active Pokémon is now Poisoned.

attacks.name: Happened to Headbutt
attacks.term_text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

attacks.name: Triplet Headbutt
attacks.term_text: Flip 3 coins. This attack does 60 damage for each heads.

attacks.name: Giga Impact
attacks.term_text: During your next turn, this Pokémon can’t attack.

ability.name: Steel Spikes
ability.description: If this Pokémon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent’s Pokémon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokémon.

attacks.name: Brass Rock
attacks.term_text: During your opponent’s next turn, this Pokémon takes −20 damage from attacks.

ability.name: Guard Dog Visage
ability.description: As long as this Pokémon is in the Active Spot, attacks used by your opponent’s Active Pokémon cost 1  more.

attacks.name: Superpowered Hug
attacks.term_text: Flip 2 coins. If both of them are heads, your opponent’s Active Pokémon is Knocked Out.

attacks.name: Quick Blow
attacks.term_text: Flip a coin. If heads, this attack does 20 more damage.

attacks.name: Brave Buddies
attacks.term_text: If you played a Supporter card from your hand during this turn, this attack does 50 more damage.

attacks.name: Moombahton
attacks.term_text: Flip a coin. If tails, this attack does nothing.

ability.name: Ultra Thrusters
ability.description: Once during your turn, you may switch your Active Ultra Beast with 1 of your Benched Ultra Beasts.

trainer_text: You can use this card only if your opponent hasn’t gotten any points.During your opponent’s next turn, all of your Ultra Beasts take −20 damage from attacks from your opponent’s Pokémon.
Switch out your opponent’s Active Basic Pokémon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokémon.)

If the  Pokémon this card is attached to is in the Active Spot and is Knocked Out by damage from an attack from your opponent’s Pokémon, move 2  Energy from that Pokémon and attach 1 Energy each to 2 of your Benched Pokémon.
Attacks used by the Ultra Beast this card is attached to do +10 damage to your opponent’s Active Pokémon for each point you have gotten.
Put 1 random Type: Null or Silvally from your deck into your hand.
Your opponent reveals all of the Supporter cards in their deck.
You can use this card only if your opponent has gotten at least 1 point.Choose 1 of your Ultra Beasts. Attach 2 random Energy from your discard pile to that Pokémon.
